participant_1.background:
I have to travel a lot for my work as a petsitter, and it's hard to keep up with my hair maintenance.
My hunting dog is the most valuable thing I own because he is my best friend and a loyal companion.
I had a hard time finding a job that fit my needs and skills.
i sing in a punk band.
i like to ride my scooter.

participant_2.background:
I make sure my family is well-provided for, even though I'm not very tall.
i m an only child.
my favorite band is the beastie boys.
i am enrolled in several college credit courses.
I can't resist a good salad from Aldi when I'm on the go.

content.text: Hello, what do you do for a living?
I'm currently taking college credit courses in hopes of getting my degree in business administration.
That's great! I'm a petsitter, which is a lot of fun but can be tiring. I have a hunting dog who is my best friend.
That sounds like an interesting job! I'm an only child so I don't have any pets. Do you like to travel?
I do! I love going to new places and meeting new people. I'm actually on my way to a punk rock concert in a few hours. What are your hobbies?
I love music! I'm a big fan of the Beastie Boys and I love going to concerts. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
That's awesome! I love the Beastie Boys too. I have a few of their albums on vinyl. What's your favorite album?
My favorite album is Paul's Boutique. I love the samples and the overall sound of the album.
That's a great album! I love the song "So What'cha Want". It's so catchy.
Yeah, that's a great song! I'm glad you like it.
Me too! What other bands do you like?
I also like the Ramones, the Clash, and the Sex Pistols.
Those are great bands! I love the Ramones and the Sex Pistols. I've never really listened to the Clash, but I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're a great band.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
